name: calculate_gcd
description: Create a Scratch program that takes two positive integers as input one after another and calculates their Greatest Common Divisor (GCD). The sprite should say the result.
instruction: Complete the given Scratch starter project that takes two positive integers as input one after another and calculates their Greatest Common Divisor (GCD). The sprite should say the result.

evaluation.description: Tests if the sprite correctly executes the task: calculate_gcd
